categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Whisper was the codename of a male Cathar agent of the Republic Strategic Information Service, the intelligence agency of the Galactic Republic, active during the Galactic War with the reconstituted Sith Empire. When the Tion Hegemony was overtaken by an outbreak of the rakghoul plague, Whisper was dispatched by Chief Rannos to recruit aid.

Whisper introduces Republic players to the Kaon Under Siege Flashpoint, which was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.1. According to the game's text files, Whisper was originally a droid named W6-S4.
